mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_category ac INNER JOIN article a ON ac.article_id = a.article_id WHERE ac.category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.click, a.comment, a.create_time, a.summary, a.user_id, a.is_original FROM article_category ac INNER JOIN article a ON ac.article_id = a.article_id WHERE ac.category_id = #{categoryId} LIMIT #{begin},#{pageSize}
SELECT c.* FROM article_category acr LEFT JOIN article a ON a.article_id = acr.article_id LEFT JOIN category c ON acr.category_id = c.category_id WHERE a.article_id = #{articleId};
SELECT c.* FROM article_category ac LEFT JOIN category c ON ac.category_id = c.category_id WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
